${ModID}:Apprehend.NAME: Apprehend
${ModID}:Apprehend.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. This enemy temporarily loses !M! Strength. lonelymod:Return.

${ModID}:FireArrows.NAME: Fire Arrow
${ModID}:FireArrows.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. At the start of the next 3 turns, this enemy takes that much damage again.

${ModID}:Feint.NAME: Feint
${ModID}:Feint.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If any damage was blocked, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:HailOfArrows.NAME: Hail Of Arrows
${ModID}:HailOfArrows.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL lonelymod:Return.

${ModID}:MarkedArrow.NAME: Marked Arrow
${ModID}:MarkedArrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! lonelymod:Target. NL lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Attack.

${ModID}:PlannedAssault.NAME: Planned Assault
${ModID}:PlannedAssault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever this card is drawn, incease its damage by !M!. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:PlotToKill.NAME: Plot To Kill
${ModID}:PlotToKill.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL lonelymod:Plan !M!. NL Next turn, gain [E].

${ModID}:QuickDraw.NAME: Quick Draw
${ModID}:QuickDraw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:StrikeTogether.NAME: Strike Together
${ModID}:StrikeTogether.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Can only be played if your lonelymod:Companion intends to lonelymod:Attack.

${ModID}:AnimalSavagery.NAME: Animal Savagery
${ModID}:AnimalSavagery.DESCRIPTION: lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Attack. NL At the start of next turn, lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Attack again.
${ModID}:AnimalSavagery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Attack. NL At the start of the next two turns, lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Attack again.

${ModID}:Distracted.NAME: Distracted
${ModID}:Distracted.DESCRIPTION: lonelymod:Autoplay. NL Shuffle 1 Instinctive Reaction into your draw pile.
${ModID}:Distracted.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: lonelymod:Autoplay. NL Place 1 Instinctive Reaction on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Forgetful.NAME: Forgetful
${ModID}:Forgetful.DESCRIPTION: lonelymod:Autoplay. NL Discard 1 random card and shuffle 1 Panic Attack into your draw pile.
${ModID}:Forgetful.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: lonelymod:Autoplay. NL Discard 1 random card and place 1 Panic Attack on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:PrepareForTrouble.NAME: Prepare For Trouble
${ModID}:PrepareForTrouble.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! lonelymod:Stamina. NL Draw !${ModID}:m2! cards. NL lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Protect.
${ModID}:PrepareForTrouble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! lonelymod:Stamina. NL Draw !${ModID}:m2! cards. NL Gain [E]. NL lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Protect.

${ModID}:Improvise.NAME: Improvise
${ModID}:Improvise.DESCRIPTION: lonelymod:Plan !M!. NL Gain !B! Block for each card selected.

${ModID}:OccultPractice.NAME: Occult Practice
${ModID}:OccultPractice.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !${ModID}:m2! Wound into your draw pile. NL Gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:StandYourGround.NAME: Stand Your Ground
${ModID}:StandYourGround.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Vigor. NL lonelymod:Return.

${ModID}:Unpredictable.NAME: Unpredictable
${ModID}:Unpredictable.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the enemy does not intend to attack, apply !M! Weak.

${ModID}:DoubleTeam.NAME: Double Team
${ModID}:DoubleTeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Gain !B! Block X times.
${ModID}:DoubleTeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X+1 times. NL Gain !B! Block X+1 times.

${ModID}:EvilTalons.NAME: Evil Talons
${ModID}:EvilTalons.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! Strength. NL Lose 2 Dexterity.

${ModID}:Kill.NAME: Kill!
${ModID}:Kill.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Attack. NL lonelymod:Return.

${ModID}:OverflowingQuiver.NAME: Overflowing Quiver
${ModID}:OverflowingQuiver.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, create a copy of this card in your hand. NL lonelymod:Return.

${ModID}:PanicAttack.NAME: Panic Attack
${ModID}:PanicAttack.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:PanicAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RelentlessOnslaught.NAME: Relentless Onslaught
${ModID}:RelentlessOnslaught.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat. NL lonelymod:Return.

${ModID}:RiskyMove.NAME: Risky Move
${ModID}:RiskyMove.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If your lonelymod:Companion intends to lonelymod:Protect, gain [E] and draw !M! card.

${ModID}:SpareTheWeak.NAME: Spare The Weak
${ModID}:SpareTheWeak.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemy minions flee. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL remaining enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SingleOut.NAME: Single Out
${ModID}:SingleOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! lonelymod:Target. NL Gain !B! Block for every other enemy in combat.

${ModID}:ABrilliantIdea.NAME: A Brilliant Idea
${ModID}:ABrilliantIdea.DESCRIPTION: lonelymod:Plan !M!. NL Upgrade selected cards for the rest of this combat.

${ModID}:BrokenHeart.NAME: Broken Heart
${ModID}:BrokenHeart.DESCRIPTION: lonelymod:Autoplay. NL Gain !M! Vulnerable and shuffle 1 Outburst into your draw pile.

${ModID}:BrokenWill.NAME: Broken Will
${ModID}:BrokenWill.DESCRIPTION: lonelymod:Autoplay. NL Gain !M! Weak and shuffle 1 Feign Weakness into your draw pile.
${ModID}:BrokenWill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: lonelymod:Autoplay. NL Gain !M! Weak and place 1 Feign Weakness on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:BrokenSpirit.NAME: Broken Spirit
${ModID}:BrokenSpirit.DESCRIPTION: lonelymod:Autoplay. NL Gain !M! Frail and shuffle 1 Primal Instinct into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Capture.NAME: Capture
${ModID}:Capture.DESCRIPTION: This turn, Whenever you attack this enemy, it temporarily loses !M! Strength

${ModID}:DarkRitual.NAME: Dark Ritual
${ModID}:DarkRitual.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Ritual. NL Discard !M! random cards.
${ModID}:DarkRitual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Ritual. NL Discard !M! random card.

${ModID}:DogPile.NAME: Dog Pile
${ModID}:DogPile.DESCRIPTION: During the next !M! turns, whenever you gain Block, lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Protect. NL Gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:InstinctiveReaction.NAME: Instinctive Reaction
${ModID}:InstinctiveReaction.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:KeepItTogether.NAME: Keep It Together
${ModID}:KeepItTogether.DESCRIPTION: This card is returned to your hand immediately if another card discards it. NL Draw !M! cards.
${ModID}:KeepItTogether.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This card is returned to your hand immediately if another card discards it. NL draw !M! cards. lonelymod:Return.

${ModID}:OvercomeWeakness.NAME: OvercomeWeakness
${ModID}:OvercomeWeakness.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity for every stack of debuffs you have. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:PartOfThePlan.NAME: Part Of The Plan
${ModID}:PartOfThePlan.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever you lonelymod:Plan, draw this card from your draw pile.

${ModID}:Fetch.NAME: Fetch!
${ModID}:Fetch.DESCRIPTION: lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Attack. NL If your lonelymod:Companion attacks this enemy this turn, grant it 1 lonelymod:Food. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Fetch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Attack. NL Apply 1 lonelymod:Target. NL If your lonelymod:Companion attacks this enemy this turn, grant it 1 lonelymod:Food. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:TacticalMove.NAME: Tactical Move
${ModID}:TacticalMove.DESCRIPTION: If this enemy intends to attack, lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Protect. NL Otherwise, lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Attack.
${ModID}:TacticalMove.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If this enemy intends to attack, lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Protect. NL Otherwise, lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Attack. NL Draw !M! card.

${ModID}:ThinkOutsideTheBox.NAME: Think Outside The Box
${ModID}:ThinkOutsideTheBox.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 Skills of any color to add into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:ThinkOutsideTheBox.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 Skills of any color to add into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to add into your hand.

${ModID}:TwistedMemory.NAME: Twisted Memory
${ModID}:TwistedMemory.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL This turn, gain !M! Strength and !${ModID}:m2! Dexterity. NL Shuffle 2 Dazed into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:TwistedMemory.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL This turn, gain !M! Strength and !${ModID}:m2! Dexterity. NL Shuffle 2 Dazed into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Unwavering.NAME: Unwavering
${ModID}:Unwavering.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain Block equal to all enemies' combined Strength + !M!. NL lonelymod:Return.

${ModID}:DefensiveReflexes.NAME: Defensive Reflexes
${ModID}:DefensiveReflexes.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw an Unplayable card, gain !M! block. NL Whenever you draw an Autoplay card, gain !${ModID}:m2! Block.
${ModID}:DefensiveReflexes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you draw an Unplayable card, gain !M! block. NL Whenever you draw an Autoplay card, gain !${ModID}:m2! Block.

${ModID}:FearOfTheBeast.NAME: Fear Of The Beast
${ModID}:FearOfTheBeast.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Attack, gain !M! lonelymod:Stamina.

${ModID}:MultiShot.NAME: Multi-Shot
${ModID}:MultiShot.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an attack card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.
${ModID}:MultiShot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an attack card, deal !M! damage !${ModID}:m2! times to a random enemy

${ModID}:PlanB.NAME: Plan B
${ModID}:PlanB.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lonelymod:Plan, but don't select any cards, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:Recover.NAME: Recover
${ModID}:Recover.DESCRIPTION: Whenever your lonelymod:Companion performs their lonelymod:Protect action, Gain [E] and draw !M! card next turn.

${ModID}:AccursedBeak.NAME: Accursed Beak
${ModID}:AccursedBeak.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Temporarily lose !M! Strength. NL If you still have Strength, play this card again. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Counterattack.NAME: Counterattack
${ModID}:Counterattack.DESCRIPTION: Deal the same damage this enemy is attacking you for, affected by your damage modifiers.

${ModID}:FeignWeakness.NAME: Feign Weakness
${ModID}:FeignWeakness.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this deals 1 damage or less, the enemy is stunned next turn. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:FeignWeakness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this deals 1 damage or less, the enemy gains !M! Weak and is stunned next turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Frenzy.NAME: Frenzy
${ModID}:Frenzy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Immediately perform your lonelymod:Companion's lonelymod:Attack Action X times.
${ModID}:Frenzy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! lonelymod:Target. NL Immediately perform your lonelymod:Companion's lonelymod:Attack Action X times.

${ModID}:MentalOverload.NAME: Mental Overload
${ModID}:MentalOverload.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Costs 1 less [E] for every card in your hand.

${ModID}:Abandon.NAME: Abandon
${ModID}:Abandon.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Permanently remove a random card in your hand from your deck. NL End your turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Cycle.NAME: Cycle
${ModID}:Cycle.DESCRIPTION: All cards that will return to your hand next turn are returned immediately.

${ModID}:DefyDeath.NAME: Defy Death
${ModID}:DefyDeath.DESCRIPTION: This turn, you cannot be reduced to less than 1 HP. NL Next turn, draw !M! more cards. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:DefyDeath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, you cannot be reduced to less than 1 HP. NL Next turn, draw !M! more cards and gain [E]. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:GrandScheme.NAME: Grand Scheme
${ModID}:GrandScheme.DESCRIPTION: Discard your draw pile. NL lonelymod:Plan !M!.

${ModID}:Lonely.NAME: Lonely
${ModID}:Lonely.DESCRIPTION: lonelymod:Autoplay. NL Shuffle your choice of Bravery, Desperation, or Resolve into your draw pile. NL It costs 0 when drawn.

${ModID}:Omen.NAME: Omen
${ModID}:Omen.DESCRIPTION: lonelymod:Autoplay. NL Discard 3 cards randomly, lonelymod:Summon lonelymod:Omen, and shuffle !M! Primal Instinct's into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Outburst.NAME: Outburst
${ModID}:Outburst.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Play a random attack from your discard pile !M! times and exhaust it. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Outburst.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Choose an attack from your discard pile. NL Play it !M! times and exhaust it. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:AncientPower.NAME: Ancient Power
${ModID}:AncientPower.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Whenever a card is discarded during your turn, play it and exhaust it.
${ModID}:AncientPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is discarded during your turn, play it and exhaust it.

${ModID}:Bravery.NAME: Bravery
${ModID}:Bravery.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if a non-minion enemy intends to attack, gain !M! temporary Strength.
${ModID}:Bravery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if a non-minion enemy intends to attack, gain !M! temporary Strength and !${ModID}:m2! temporary Dexterity.

${ModID}:Desperation.NAME: Desperation
${ModID}:Desperation.DESCRIPTION: The first time you run out of energy each turn, gain [E] which you can only use on attacks.
${ModID}:Desperation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first time you run out of energy each turn, draw 1 card and gain [E] which you can only use on attacks.

${ModID}:MuscleMemory.NAME: Muscle Memory
${ModID}:MuscleMemory.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card lonelymod:Returns, temporarily reduce it's cost by 1.
${ModID}:MuscleMemory.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever a card lonelymod:Returns, temporarily reduce it's cost by 1.

${ModID}:Resolve.NAME: Resolve
${ModID}:Resolve.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose hp, gain !M! Plated Armor.
${ModID}:Resolve.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose hp, gain !M! Plated Armor and trigger Plated Armor.

${ModID}:WildForm.NAME: Wild Form
${ModID}:WildForm.DESCRIPTION: Grant your lonelymod:Companion !M! lonelymod:Food. NL At the start of each turn, discard 1 random card and lonelymod:Call lonelymod:Attack.

${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.NAME: Inline Power
${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Strikes deal !M! more damage. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: additional damage. At the end of your turn, gain #b

${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.NAME: Two Amount Power
${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Strength and !${ModID}:m2! Dexterity.

${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.NAME: Cool Card Stuff
${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.DESCRIPTION: Choose from 1 of 3 cost 0 cards from any class. NL Add it into your hand. NL It gains Ethereal and Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to add into your hand with Ethereal and Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.NAME: Easy X Cost
${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Gain X Strength. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X+1 times. NL Gain X+1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.NAME: Easy Modal Choice
${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Draw !M! cards or gain !${ModID}:m2! Strength.

${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.NAME: Draw and Shiv
${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Add 1 *Shiv into your hand.

${ModID}:TwoTypesOfDamage.NAME: Two Damage Values
${ModID}:TwoTypesOfDamage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you're Vulnerable, deal !${ModID}:sd! damage instead.

${ModID}:StartupBlockCard.NAME: Startup And AOE
${ModID}:StartupBlockCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Startup: Gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.NAME: Previews and Callbacks
${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle *Smite and *Safety into your draw pile. NL Draw 1 card. NL If it's Colorless, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle *Smite and *Safety into your draw pile. NL Draw 1 card. NL If it's Colorless, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
